page.title: 12FAVOURITE BOOKS.
page.content: Children's favourite books include The Twits,Revolting Rhymes,The BFG, and The Enormous Crocodile,these are all written by{Roald Dahl.}He has written many interesting and exciting books for children and adults. {Roger {Hargreaves}has written a set of books called The Mr.Men which are popular with 4 to 6 yr olds, they also enjoy The Three Little Pigs, Topsy & Tim,The Three Billy Goats Gruff and The Gingerbread Man.7 to 11 yr olds enjoy some Enid Blyton like The Famous Five,The Faraway Tree and The Secret Seven.They also enjoy adventure books like Space Base 2000,War Horse,Riddle of the Frozen Fountain,Temple of Terror and The Island of the Green Lizard.These are very exciting, some have several different endings which you can choose from to make your own adventure.
